entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • False-positive for IDE0251 Make member readonly #67531
  • /pathmap to root broken in .csproj when path has a space in it. #67528
  • CS8063 - Improve wording #67525
  • Assert failures handling DynamicObjectCreationExpression in GetValEscape() and CheckValEscape() #67518
  • Formatter doesn't work correctly with nested list patterns #67516
  • Remove locking from ProjectSystemProjectFactory (and use Workspace's lock instead). #67510

Closed

  • Either change nameof or change the warning rules #67526
  • Roslyn 4.5 does not enable DiagnosticAnalyzers via the ruleset file anymore #67211
  • Crash in compiler while editing in roslyn. #66960
    17.6

PullRequests

Created

  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.6-vs-deps #67532
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Round-trip extensions via metadata #67530
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.6-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #67529
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Work to unify threading concepts between Workspace and ProjectSystemProjectFactory (part2) #67524
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Work to unify threading concepts between Workspace and ProjectSystemProjectFactory (part1) #67522
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Handle assignments in patterns #67517
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #67513
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Update ExtractInterface to use IRefactoringHelpersService #67482
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Visit replacement expression before adding placeholder in RefSafetyAnalysis visitor #67155
    Area-Compilers
  • Remove code for 'push' diagnostic tagging #67505
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Allow nested instance member access in `nameof` in static context #67461
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add net8.0 TFM to source-built packages #67333
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Ignore private methods for awaitable types in IDE0051 #64688
    Area-Analyzers, Community
  • Async lightbulb performance improvement #66970
    Area-IDE
